name: "Supergirl" Season 1 Episode 16 Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Cat Grant was named #1 on the National City power list. What show did she appear on to celebrate?
questions.explanation:
The Talk.

	"The Talk" was a real show on CBS, the same network where season 1 of "Supergirl" aired. They interviewed her about being the most powerful "person" in the city, and if she was friends with Supergirl.

questions.text: What was Wynn doing when Kara went to find him?
options: Hacking into the Lex Corp. computer system
Reading a book in the men's room
Talking with James on the balcony
questions.explanation:
Making out in the closet.

	He was with Siobhan, in the supply closet. She had been hired a few episodes earlier and took over many of Kara's duties at work. Kara found them and used her X-Ray vision to see if it was him in the closet. "I'm never using anything from that closet again" she told Wynn.

questions.text: Which employee quit working at CatCo?
questions.explanation:
Lucy Lane.

	After breaking up with James in the last episode she quit off camera. Lucy didn't appear in the episode, but it was an important "B" plot between Kara and her friends and family.

questions.text: What disaster was it that caused Supergirl to be called away from a meeting with a U.S. Senator?
questions.explanation:
Fire on a skyscraper.

	She flew in and put out the fire, helped to save the trapped firefighters and then left. What she didn't notice was hidden in the debris was a chunk of red Kryptonite. Red Kryptonite hadn't appeared on the show prior to this.

questions.text: What did the Red Kryptonite do to Supergirl?
questions.explanation:
Changed her personality.

	Green Kryptonite affects her powers, red her emotional spectrum. The red Kryptonite caused her to become rude and extremely arrogant.

questions.text: What species was the villain that Supergirl fought off and released?
questions.explanation:
K'Hunn.

	She battled him while under the effects of red Kryptonite. She rattled off a list of alien species she had fought off and then told him he wasn't worth looking at. She then told him to leave before she changed her mind.

questions.text: What newspaper was Siobhan Smythe trying to feed story tips to after Cat refused to run them?
questions.explanation:
The Daily Planet.

	Kara copied the email she was sending to Perry White, deleted it, and gave it to Cat. Siobhan was then fired.

questions.text: Supergirl threw Cat off the top of a building.
questions.explanation:
True.

	"True power Cat, is deciding who will live and who will die", she said right before doing the deed. She tossed Cat off the top of her own building, then saved her just before she hit the ground, but did so in front of a large crowd.

questions.text: Who made the synthetic red Kryptonite?
questions.explanation:
Maxwell Lord.

	Lord came into the DEO to tell them that he created the red Kryptonite to help fight Non, and that he never intended to use it on Supergirl. The synthetic red Kryptonite didn't react with Kryptonians in the way he had intended. The DEO was a secret government agency that Supergirl worked with.

questions.text: Hank revealed himself as an alien to the public in order to stop Supergirl.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He had already revealed his true identity to most of the people closest to him in prior episodes. Kara was about to attack Alex in the street when Hank turned into his true form and they fought briefly. Alex was then able to hit Kara with the cure to the red Kryptonite. Hank then turned back into his human form and was arrested.
